channel.title: How did my server get hacked?
channel.description:
The last couple of days I had been working on my server and when it was operational I posted it on the status page.
Within an hour there had been a few people log on one of which managed to hack the client and move the npc's around going nuts spamming the server.
I'm quite new to server making so this was really un-expected, is there a way to avoid being hacked like that again?
Thanks,

item.title: How did my server get hacked?
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

baspwnzz:

Probally A cheat client

item.title: How did my server get hacked?
item.dc:creator: @Almost_Easy Almost_Easy
item.description:
@Almost_Easy wrote:

I removed his character.

And i still want to use the Dragon-History source because i really like it but i don’t want it to be so unstable.

Can some one link me to some tuts for Anti-SYI and Anti-NULL please?

Read full topic
item.source: How did my server get hacked?

item.title: How did my server get hacked?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Almost_Easy, post:8, topic:307234”]I was using Dragon-History source which apparently did have Anti-SYI. I’m now using NullzPk 317 Source and Client.

Do you have any script i can put somewhere to help?[/quote]

Nullpkz is a leeched version of my source… (This gets around a little too much.)

@Topic: Shouldn’t happen unless you removed something in the player files allowing people to do such things. And yes, magic will move NPCs…

Read full topic

item.title: How did my server get hacked?
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote=“freakinlost, post:5, topic:307234”][code]import java.util.ArrayList;
public class SYIBlocker{

public final static void start(){
addCrasher(“SYIpkpker”);
}

public final static void addCrasher(String Name){
Names.add(Name.toLowerCase());
}

public final static boolean bannedSYI(String _Name){
_Name = _Name.toLowerCase();
for(String Name : Names)
if(_Name.contains(Name))
return true;
for(Character c : _Name.toCharArray())
if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit©)
if(Character.isSpaceChar©)
if(!Character.isSpaceChar©)
return true;
return false;
}

public final static void banIP(String Address){
Addresses.add(Address.toLowerCase());
}

public final static boolean bannedIP(String _Address){
_Address = _Address.toLowerCase();
for(String Address : Addresses)
if(Address.equals(_Address))
return true;
return false;
}
public static ArrayList Names = new ArrayList();
public static ArrayList Addresses = new ArrayList();
}[/code]

try that[/quote]

Wouldnt neccecerrily do anything. whats ur source

Read full topic

[code]import java.util.ArrayList;
public class SYIBlocker{

public final static void start(){
addCrasher(“SYIpkpker”);
}

public final static void addCrasher(String Name){
Names.add(Name.toLowerCase());
}

public final static boolean bannedSYI(String _Name){
_Name = _Name.toLowerCase();
for(String Name : Names)
if(_Name.contains(Name))
return true;
for(Character c : _Name.toCharArray())
if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit©)
if(Character.isSpaceChar©)
if(!Character.isSpaceChar©)
return true;
return false;
}

public final static void banIP(String Address){
Addresses.add(Address.toLowerCase());
}

public final static boolean bannedIP(String _Address){
_Address = _Address.toLowerCase();
for(String Address : Addresses)
if(Address.equals(_Address))
return true;
return false;
}
public static ArrayList Names = new ArrayList();
public static ArrayList Addresses = new ArrayList();
}[/code]

item.title: How did my server get hacked?
item.dc:creator: @Almost_Easy Almost_Easy
item.description:
@Almost_Easy wrote:

Oh, i just turned it offf after it happened.

Basically a guy asked for admin, i said you can’t ask for it, you have to earn it. He kept of going on and on so i just told him no and jailed him because he wouldn’t take no for an aswer.

Then i see someone come on with MY name(Almost Easy) he go nuts with spamming, and he said “try ban me, come on, ban me! because i can just un-ban myself!” and the npc were just walking around edgeville bank where he was. He also did ::pnpc into something that you can’t see.

Oh and, where can i get this anti SYI thing?

Read full topic
item.source: How did my server get hacked?

item.title: How did my server get hacked?
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

mod cody:

yea you need something called ANTI SYIPKPKER

syipker only crashes servers it cant move npcs and stuff like that… continue running your server and post again with the description of exactly what happens… your server runner.bat will tell u wat is going on
